document_data.mainbody:
Memoirs of an Illithid-Human Crossbreed was a book written by Naneetha Shinalstar, War-Mage of Saelmur on the Lake of Steam, and published in the .
It was a biography of Naneethas life and exploits, including her love of the realm of Turmish.
The original was kept in the great fortress-library of Candlekeep around 1372 DR.
